components.name: Logger
components.description: Logger is a small utility library. It makes API call to log messages over splunk.

components.name: Alerter
components.description: Alerter is a plungin which is written in native javascript and framework agnostic. We can use alerter to show and kind of alert or notification. It accepts custom HTML as well.

components.name: Grid
components.description: Grid system. Featurs includes: Pagination, Sorting, Filtering
